lead_paragraph: Barcelona cruised to a 2-0 win at Levante and regained their three-point lead at the top of La Liga on Sunday, as Real Madrid maintained their pursuit with a laboured 2-1 win at Granada.

headline.print_headline: Barca Three Points Clear, Real Keep Up Chase
headline.main: Barca Three Points Clear, Real Keep Up Chase
